entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or freezing rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain mixed with snow in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023
